msg: This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 's1ap8_i4'.

author: hgomez
msg: Fix for mod_dir/mod_jk, now the DirectoryIndex directive will be correctly handled and forwarded

author: hgomez
msg: 3rd parm to apr_file_write() should be apr_size_t, not unsigned.

author: billbarker
msg: Fixes for CLIENT-CERT auth when using PureTLS
1) We need to set the rootFile always, since it is needed for CLIENT-CERT even when clientAuth="false".
2) Fix off-by-one problem with generating the x509 certs.
